name: SheheraZ
description:
Press the right arrow key to move your Zombie. When you're behind a dancer, press the displayed button and keep it down to stay hidden during the day. The longer you stay hidden, the more you'll get points. When you reach a new screen, the game will get faster.

Game made in 2 days by Pankoman, Gwendal Reuzé, Adrien Poncet, Anais Jancenelle, Laura Chan, Paul Rouillard.

My website
